records.Name: San Juanico Bridge
records.Description: A scenic bridge connecting Leyte and Samar, known for its impressive length and beautiful views.

records.Name: Leyte Landing Memorial
records.Description: A historical site commemorating the Allied forces' landing during World War II, featuring a monument and a museum.

records.Name: For Example
records.Description: A historical site commemorating the Allied forces' landing during World War II, featuring a monument and a museum.

records.Name: Tacloban City Hall
records.Description: The seat of the local government in Tacloban City, notable for its historical significance and architectural style.

records.Name: Red Beach
records.Description: A beach with historical significance as the landing site of the American forces during World War II, popular for its relaxing atmosphere.

records.Name: Sto. Ni√±o Shrine and Heritage Museum
records.Description: A historic shrine and museum showcasing religious artifacts, antiques, and the heritage of Tacloban City.

records.Name: Madonna of Japan
records.Description: A peaceful park featuring a statue of the Madonna of Japan, symbolizing peace and friendship between the Philippines and Japan.
